properties.markdownProperty:
Proteus profiles define specifics configurations for the application. They contain multiple resources as archetypes, xslt, icons, translations and plugins.
Creating a profile is as simple as creating an empty folder and a `profile.ini` file. Profile init file must have the following content:
``` [directories] archetypes_directory = your_archetype_repo_folder xslt_directory = your_xslts_folder plugins_directory = icons_directory = i18n_directory =
[preferences] default_view = one_of_the_xslt_from_your_folder ```
`archetypes_directory` and `xslt_directory` must be defined. The other directories can be optional.
`default_view` attribute is used to set a default view if the user change profiles. It must match the `name` of one of the XSLT templates present in the xslt_directory. If not valid it will use the first loaded template.
